## Ingredients

* 1 8 oz pkg cream cheese (softened)
* 1 egg
* 1/4 cup sugar
* 1/2 cup flaked coconut
* 1 cup semi sweet chocolate chips

* Chocolate cake batter [@flight2021chocolate]

## Directions

* Mix filling ingredients in a bowl, set aside. 
* Make chocolate cake batter.
* Pour 1/2 batter into cake pan. 
* Add chunks of filling to batter, add the rest of the batter.

* Bake at 350F for an hour.

Source: Stella Trask
